name: Ethereum S.744
description:
This is a walking simulator to explore and learn about Ethereum S.744.  We hope you enjoy it. This game was created using the GameGuru Classic engine. It is experimental in that Odd Bergman Studios is interested in creating frequent, small experiences for people who like exploration and immersive applications. It is our hope that by using quick development tools we will be able to accomplish this goal.

Odd Bergman Studios is an imprint of PlayPath Experiences.

If you enjoy EthereumS.744, please leave a comment.

Known Issues: 

  • First run of .exe sometimes fails, but loads fine the next time. 
  • Occasional game crashes; origin unknown. Doesn't crash computer.
  • Runs best with a secondary GPU, rather than onboard graphics cards.
  • Runs best with at least 8GB RAM.
